name: Tower of Transistor (GMTK GameJam 2019)
description:
Humankind has used up all of its land area on industry, corporations and living. It's too crowded everywhere and people want to move into space.

However, there is only one plot of land left on the entire planet, so the best scientists group up to build the most advanced AI computer ever to leave Earth and fly among the stars.
The problem is, they can only use spare computer blocks and drop them from above. Stack the tower as high as possible and don't make it fall!

Made during the Game Makers Toolkit Game Jam in 2019.

Theme: Only One.
